Colors

All Sass color variables prefixed with $color-. This makes it easy to figure out what a variable is for later.

Brand Colors

$color-ma-dark-blue
#071d49
$color-ma-lite-blue
#2C5697
$color-ma-aqua
#77c5d5
$color-ma-lavender
#6F7BD4
$color-ma-orange
#e03c31


Brand Grays

$color-ma-lite-gray
#d9d9d6
$color-ma-medium-gray
#BCBCBC
$color-ma-gray
#767676
$color-ma-dark-gray
#535353


Common

$color-black
#000
$color-white
#fff
